about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for the Nidhogg 2 Soundtrack with some extras that aren't in the game!

Mux Mool - Intentional Death and Dismemberment Plan
Geotic - Knapsack
Mux Mool - Thrust
Mux Mool - Raw Gore
Mux Mool - Menu Chow
Osborne - Sums
Mux Mool - Hog Knuckles
Mux Mool - Land Of Sand
Doseone - Number1
Mux Mool - Foghat Leghat
Daedelus - Tiptoes
Mux Mool - Oh Yeah
Mux Mool - Grunt

Once the DLC is installed...
1. Find Nidhogg 2 in your Steam Library
2. Right click it and go to Properties
3. Go to the Local Files tab
4. Click Browse Local FIles
5. Open the Nidhogg 2 Soundtrack folder
6. Enjoy!
detailed_description:
Prepare yourself for the Nidhogg 2 Soundtrack with some extras that aren't in the game!

Mux Mool - Intentional Death and Dismemberment Plan
Geotic - Knapsack
Mux Mool - Thrust
Mux Mool - Raw Gore
Mux Mool - Menu Chow
Osborne - Sums
Mux Mool - Hog Knuckles
Mux Mool - Land Of Sand
Doseone - Number1
Mux Mool - Foghat Leghat
Daedelus - Tiptoes
Mux Mool - Oh Yeah
Mux Mool - Grunt

Once the DLC is installed...
1. Find Nidhogg 2 in your Steam Library
2. Right click it and go to Properties
3. Go to the Local Files tab
4. Click Browse Local FIles
5. Open the Nidhogg 2 Soundtrack folder
6. Enjoy!

Minimum:
  • OS: x
  • Processor: 500mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: none
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: mp3 files

reviews:
“one of the best soundtracks in recent memory.”
95 – Destructoid
short_description: The Nidhogg 2 game soundtrack! 13 heart pounding, soul snuggling songs from Mux Mool, Daedelus, Geotic, Doseone, and Osborne.
